title: akaros
author: akaros
content: Hello, i have fully working old miners in very nice condition. Maybe someone want like souvenir or lottery mining I can send only in EU.Price you can offerAntminer S3/S3+ without PSU (5+ pcs) (very old model, fully working, nostalgic item Antminer L3+ with or without PSU (10+ pcs)Antminer S17+ (psu included) (50+ pcs)Everything I offer is 100% working and in nice conditionBUT! I can offer also not working miners, mostly S17+ - not working PSU and Hashboards but with working control boards and fans. Please if you are interested just PM me with price offer.Have a nice day

comments.author: Papillion
comments.body: you might want to hold onto those wifi devices just a little bit longer than usual.also, photo's of the hashing devices and your forum name on a little scrap of paper is extremely useful
